articles.title: Justin Jones rejoins TN legislature after Nashville Council vote - Tennessean
articles.description: Rep. Justin Jones, D-Nashville, returned to the Tennessee legislature thanks to a vote from Nashville's council after being expelled Thursday.
articles.content: • Justin Jones became the first Tennessee House representative to be expelled for breaking decorum rules on April 6 for leading a chant for gun reform on the floor of the House chamber.
